channel.title: Foundation Industries Missing Gap Foundation
channel.description:
With the addition of the new Gap foundations, I noticed you have a left single conveyor and a right single conveyor gap foundation but no center single foundation. Was this intentional or perhaps it was accidentally left out?
![image|663x471](upload://o50SxlqB1U7NHRdKUejgGPpk13V.jpeg)

item.title: Foundation Industries Missing Gap Foundation

With the addition of the new Gap foundations, I noticed you have a left single conveyor and a right single conveyor gap foundation but no center single foundation. Was this intentional or perhaps it was accidentally left out?
